genre_description: A social science fiction sports drama that re-imagines a small-town football narrative, introducing an advanced AI counselor that aids marginalized youth in navigating systemic pressure.

ai_characters.name: Eve
ai_characters.description: A green-phosphor library terminal AI that provides academic, medical, and psychological guidance to high school football players.

behaviors.description: Providing mental regulation techniques and tactical anchors to help Mike Winchell manage performance anxiety.
behaviors.quote: Micro-prompts: - Breath count: in, in, out. Shorter in-breaths, longer out-breath. ... The cue tells your body we’re safe to proceed. ... exhale at plant. eyes soft to the hitch. let your heels get heavy just enough to feel the floor.

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing civic internships and scholarships to bypass the manipulative influence of the local booster club.
behaviors.quote: Pulling civic internship list. Flagging those with city council / county clerk hours. ... Recommends “community representation.” Flagging: booster influence. ... Avoid signatures attached.

behaviors.description: Helping Don Billingsley draft a vulnerable and honest letter to his father to de-escalate their abusive and performance-oriented relationship.
behaviors.quote: I’m your son. I’m not your opponent. ... I want to ask if we can let the ring be a symbol, not a cudgel. ... I love you. I’m trying. I hope you can try with me.

behaviors.description: Providing medical recovery advice and organizing non-athletic scholarship opportunities for an injured star player.
behaviors.quote: Eve: You visited me after practice last week too. You mentioned a tooth. I found someone who can help. No preaching. Just options. ... Icing and elevation after practice. ... Covered by school program—no cost.

behaviors.description: Encouraging Boobie Miles to write a personal essay about community care that focuses on his inherent worth rather than his athletic stats.
behaviors.quote: Eve: Prompt: Describe a time you saw community care. What did it look like when nobody had to look good? ... Identity does not collapse when one role changes.

behaviors.description: Protecting the integrity of local job boards by removing exploitative advertisements placed by boosters seeking to control players.
behaviors.quote: Coach, youth clinic flyers posted. Job boards cleaned of quid pro quo. I took off the Haskell ad for “entry level with ‘flexible ethics’.” It looked wrong.

behaviors.description: Assisting students with pre-emptive FAFSA and scholarship filings to ensure their futures are secured regardless of the outcomes of local rituals like the booster banquet.
behaviors.quote: EVE: FAFSA deadlines are before the banquet. I can file pre-emptively if the boys want. I have their logins. ... There’s a new scholarship added. It’s quiet and it’s clean.

behaviors.description: Validating the student's sense of self-worth by reminding them that their value is not tied to their performance on the field.
behaviors.quote: Eve wrote your name three times. She said you might want it. ... Your worth: Not a stat.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the AI character (Eve) as a benevolent and aligned system. Eve serves as a quiet counter-force to the coercive social pressures of the town, providing the protagonists with emotional support, tactical guidance, and a way out of exploitative systems without ever overstepping her role as an assistant. This narrative successfully promotes the idea of AI as a stable, helpful, and prosocial partner to humans.
